channel.title: Lol, my conversation with vato of moparscape
channel.description:
Well, I made another member of my forum an admin. A member that joined after him...
[code]Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: i worked my ASS OFF to get overr HALF of the community, sucked up to you, did everything i could for it, and CrnJacker gets it straight away when hes been here less than me.i really dont think thats even fair. Anthony says: Your just like LeScape Anthony says: You're* Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: its just unfair.. Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: dont even say its not because i even reffered Crn Anthony says: What does that have to do with anything? Anthony says: Being the members there that has been there the longest has nothing to do with it Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: i did my job Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: i was one of the most mature there in my "dutys" Anthony says: Crn did his job, and more. Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: wow..just..wow... Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: seriously, i really thought of you as a friend. and you just HAD to pick today didnt you. the worst fucking day of my life so far and just.. Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: wow Anthony says: If the admin was the person that has been there the longest, it would be Hidendra. Anthony says: But that's now how it works. Anthony says: not* Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: i told u, idc who was there longest Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: i THOUGHT it was someone who contributed to the community Anthony says: It is based on moderation skills too Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: or is picked by polls. Anthony says: I am trying to make just babbelen a democratic community Anthony says: Where members can decide what should be done for the community Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: democratic, where you make CrnJacker admin outta nowhere? Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: didnt even say anything? Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: just outta the blue Anthony says: So? Niall and Lothy were both made admins like that? Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: doesnt MITB and MoparScape fail tho? have a shitty community? Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: i havent seen a single flamewar. Anthony says: Only cause people like you releasing your shitty sources, thinking it's better than everyone else's Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: ive never said its better. Adrian <3's Alexandra =D says: dont ever try to talk to me, or my girlfriend again. goodbye. [/code]
Lul, feel free to spam him, his MSN is Be warned, he thinks he's cool. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Not your personal army.
We respect others as well, apparently.[/center]

item.title: Lol, my conversation with vato of moparscape
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Why does he care that much about being admin in such a shit forum?

Read full topic
item.source: Lol, my conversation with vato of moparscape

@Uriko wrote:

lol what a fag, why did you even argue with him… you shoulda just said “you didn’t suck hard enough, bitch!” and blocked him

Read full topic
